title: Internship Rome, Italy
description:
Position: Back Office Internship

Company: Toyota Insurance Management / Aioi Nissay Dowa
         Insurance
         Company of Europe Limited

Location: Rome, Italy

Industry: Motor insurance

Time frame: Six months (start date 15th of January 2011)

Reimbursement: 600 EUR

Working hours: 9 am – 6 pm (including lunch break 45  
               minutes)

Job description: 
Support the Back Office within different tasks:
* Preparing master data for the program IVVR
* Cooperation with the IT department in Germany
* Translations from/to Italian, German and English
* General administrative duties

Qualification and skills:
* Graduated from high school or enrolled at university,
  preferable in business administration
* Advanced language skills in German, Italian and English
  both written and oral
* Good computer skills in Microsoft Office
* Previous experience in the insurance sector is beneficial,
  but not mandatory

If you are interested in completing this internship, please send us your application in Italian and English (cover letter and curriculum vitae) by e-mail indicating also
your availability.

E-MAIL CONTACT: human.resources@it.toyota-fs.com
